content_not_support_audio: This movie has audio which is not supported by UnlockMyTV, please install VLC player to play audio.
update_content:
Jan. 5th 2019 version 2.1.5



- Add some link providers.

- Hot fix bug autorun on some Android boxes.



Jan. 4th 2019 version 2.1.2



- Add many HD direct links, Google Video and Fbcdn(fast link)

- Fix bugs.



Jan. 3rd 2019 version 2.1.1



- Fix trailer on Firestick, FireTV, Nvidia Shield and other Android boxes.

- Add feature to backup and restore watchlist, watched history.

- Add feature to auto backup before updating.

- Add feature to auto play next episode. You can choose number of link to auto play.

- Fix keyboard hide screen when logging to trakt on some devices.
